Analyte(s): IgG antibodies to Cyclic Citrullinated Peptides (CCP)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Immunoscan CCPlus ELISA kit for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of anti-CCP IgG antibodies in human serum as an aid in diagnosing rheumatoid arthritis
Indications for Use Summary: Aid in diagnosis of rheumatoid arthritis by qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of IgG antibodies to cyclic citrullinated peptides in human serum using ELISA, for use by trained laboratory professionals
